page.title: 06Our local radio station.
page.content: Swansea Sound is the name of our local radio station,it is only a few hundred yards from the school.There are thirty people working full time in the station,and forty in all. The station opened in 1974 and last year celebrated its'tenth birthday.There are three recording studios in the building,two that are used for daily programmes and one that they use for recording groups or choirs. One of the D.J's,Mr Gari Owen came to speak to us in school.He presents a Welsh language programme four times a week.The news is also read in Welsh three times a day.He told us that in this area Swansea Sound is the most listened to radio station,with even more listeners than Radio 1.It was very interesting to go and meet the faces behind the voices.
